title: Drawing for 30RP   Hope this works and hope you like it!

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Not exactly the most experienced drawer but I gave it a shot

replies.body:
If you want to submit art for a small sum of RP you need to do it through player support:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
